\Aura\CliContext

Collection point for information about the command-line execution context.

Tags

todo

getEnv()

getEnv(string $key, string $alt) : mixed

Retrieves an **unfiltered** value by key from the $env property, or an alternate default value if that key does not exist.

Parameters

string $key

The $env key to retrieve the value of.
string $alt

The value to return if the key does not exist.

Returns

mixed —

The value of $env[$key], or the alternate default value.

Tags

todo

getServer()

getServer(string $key, string $alt) : mixed

Retrieves an **unfiltered** value by key from the $server property, or an alternate default value if that key does not exist.

Parameters

string $key

The $server key to retrieve the value of.
string $alt

The value to return if the key does not exist.

Returns

mixed —

The value of $server[$key], or the alternate default value.

Tags

todo

getArgv()

getArgv(int $key, string $alt) : mixed

Retrieves an **unfiltered** value by position from the `$argv` property, or an alternate default value if that position does not exist.

Parameters

int $key

The $argv positional key to retrieve the value of.
string $alt

The value to return if the key does not exist.

Returns

mixed —

The value of $server[$key], or the alternate default value.

Tags

todo

shiftArgv()

shiftArgv() : mixed

Shifts the first value off the `$argv` property and returns it. Note that this modifies the `$argv` property; if you need the original, unmodified arguments, call `server('argv')`.

Returns

mixed —

The value shifted off the beginning of the $argv property.

Tags

todo

setArgv()

setArgv(array $argv) : void

Sets the `$argv` property.

Parameters

array $argv

The new value of $argv.

Tags

todo

getValue()

getValue(string $var, string $key, string $alt) : mixed

Common method to get a property value and return it.

Parameters

string $var

The property variable to fetch from: get, post, etc.
string $key

The array key in that property, if any, to get the value of.
string $alt

The alternative default value to return if the requested key does not exist.

Returns

mixed —

The requested value, or the alternative default value.

Tags

todo
